common.name: Name

common.noPermissionEditJourney: You do not have permission to edit this journey.
common.noPermissionChangePublicStatus: You do not have permission to change the public status of this journey.

common.fileNotImageOrVideo: File '{{fileName}}' is not an image or video.
common.geolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.
common.locationRequestTimedOut: The request to get user location timed out.
common.authRequiredCreatePost: Authentication required to create a post.
common.selectJourneyBeforePost: Please select a journey before creating a post.
common.noPermissionCreatePost: You do not have permission to create posts in this journey.
common.atLeastTitleMessageMediaOrCoordsRequired: At least a title, message, media, or coordinates are required.
common.pleaseWaitForMediaUploads: Please wait for media uploads to complete.
common.authRequiredDeletePost: Authentication required to delete a post.
common.noPermissionDeletePost: You do not have permission to delete this post.
common.noPermissionEditPost: You do not have permission to edit this post.
common.failedToLoadJourneyNotPublic: Failed to load journey or it is not public.
common.failedToLoadPostsForJourney: Failed to load posts for this journey.

auth.enterCredentials: Enter your credentials to access your journeys and posts.
auth.firstAdminAccount: This will be the first (and only) user you can register. This user will be an administrator.

adminPage.deleteUserDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the user @{{username}} and all their associated journeys, posts, and collaborations.
adminPage.deleteJourneyDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the journey "{{journeyName}}" and all its associated posts and collaborator permissions.

publicJourneyPage.journeyNotFoundDescription: The public journey you are looking for does not exist or is not accessible.

manageJourneyDialog.anyoneCanView: Anyone with this link can view your journey's posts without logging in.
